Square Limit

Matthew Henderson

2016-11-01

library(funcgeo)
library(grid)

f <- linesGrob(
  x = c(.1, .9, .9, .2, .2, .6, .6, .2, .2, .1, .1),
  y = c(.9, .9, .8, .8, .6, .6, .5, .5, .1, .1, .9),
  vp = viewport(width = 1, height = 1)
)

Figure 1

grid.draw(f)

grid.draw(rot(f))

grid.draw(flip(f))

grid.draw(rot(flip(f)))

Figure 2

grid.draw(above(f, f))

grid.draw(beside(f, f))

grid.draw(above(beside(f, f), f))

grid.draw(rot(f, angle = 45))

footnotes1

  1. P. Henderson “Functional Geometry”↩
